name: LZ
description:
NOTE: This game has not got any networking or zombies as of this build but it will be added soon! Feel free to put in suggestions for future builds.

The aim of this project is to have a fun co-op wave survival game for LAN gaming.

This is mainly for a college project so I'm not sure how much I will work on this but I am enjoying it so it may stick around. (:

To stay up to date with my projects check out my twitter.

https://twitter.com/WireMonkeyGames
